text: Merina Philip Joe (born 5 May 1995) is a Solomon Islands women's footballer who plays as a midfielder for Koloale. ==Career== Joe made her international debut for the Solomon Islands on 6 July 2015, starting in the 2015 Pacific Games match against New Caledonia. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Solomon Islands |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2015||3||1 |- |2017||4||0 |- |2018||1||0 |- !Total!!8!!1 |} ===International goals=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !No.!!Date!!Venue!!Opponent!!Score!!Result!!Competition |- | 1 || 11 July 2015 || Bisini Sports Complex, Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea || || align=center|1–2 || align=center|1–2 || 2015 Pacific Games |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile at oceaniafootball.com Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Solomon Islands women's footballers Category:Solomon Islands women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders
title: Merina Joe
